item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Max Richter-Hans Zimmer-Jóhann Jóhannsson Compilations
item.description:
Hello my dear Music Friends,

I am hoping to dive into the world of modern classical music and I am hoping one of you will have the following in her or his collection.

Voyager - Essential Max Richter

https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/voyager-essential-max-richter-max-richter/iqekkklwf7xkc

The Music Of Hans Zimmer - The Definitive Collection

https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/t...f-prague-philharmonic-orchestra/lzevdnhskoxrb

Jóhann Jóhannsson – Retrospective I

Jóhann Jóhannsson – Retrospective II

Fingers crossed !

Thanks a million.
item.author: Jim King
